item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Conference Talk Beyond Listening and Speaking The Role of Writing in Fostering Critical Thought in Literature Students Grant Matthew Rosson Vilnius University 2024 Better Knowledge Through Asking Questions Better/Deeper/Fuller Understanding Through Writing Questions Better/Deeper/Fuller Understanding Through Writing Questions Sapere aude! (Dare to know!) â€œ[F]rom the very start, the mind should not be left to itself, but be constantly controlled; and the business done (if I may put it this way) by machines.
